channel.title: I could use a little help please
channel.description: I know the basics of Java programming, but i want to create arcade-like games for a website. What language do you create those in? im going to start learning whatever language that may be... Please reply

item.title: I could use a little help please
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“clienthax, post:8, topic:168014”][quote author=VB7 Rocks link=topic=227500.msg1957925#msg1957925 date=1198841982]
C++ is not embeddable into webpages.

Java and Flash are pretty much the only two choices, unless you want to use Microsoft’s gay Silverlight thing.
[/quote]
not directly embeddable but if you use a bridge however somtimes it is possible[/quote]

I doubt most computers will allow a webpage to execute a binary program, however.

Read full topic
item.source: I could use a little help please
